About

Hello! I’m an Oxford Graduate Student in machine learning at Oxford, supervised by François Caron.

My research interests are mainly in representation learning and generative models. Previously, I’ve worked on Statistical learning for hierarchical representation.

Before starting my degree, I worked as a scientific programmer at NovaDiscovery. I also studied Engineering at Ecole Centrale Paris now CentraleSupelec.
